intro: This document outlines the IT architecture principles and implementation guidelines for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS), as administered by the European Environment Agency (EEA). It serves as a framework to ensure consistency, scalability, and security across all CLMS IT solutions, emphasizing modularity, reproducibility, transparency, maintainability, and resilience. These principles aim to guide the design, development, and evolution of IT solutions within the CLMS programme, aligning with its IT vision and strategy for efficient operation and adaptability.
